name: @gnodi/karma-gnodi
description: Test your gnodi libs with karma!
author: Thomas Prelot <tprelot@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Gnucki)

scripts.test: NODE_ENV='test' jasmine test.js index.js test/unit/ lib/
scripts.test-coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter text-summary
scripts.test-coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter text-lcov | coveralls
